backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color variables, themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads fonts and mounts the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the Valentine page and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/HeartsBackground: Animated floating hearts background component with dense and sparse modes.
frontend/src/config/valentineContent.ts: Static default Valentine content including hero text, story, reasons, gallery, and surprise settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication hook and provider handling Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom pastel Valentine color variables, plus utility classes for gradients, shadows, and themed colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineSinglePage.t: Composes the full single-page Valentine layout with themed sections and a customization panel wrapped in the personalization provider.
Validates audio file type/size and converts audio files to data URLs.
frontend/src/personalization/CustomizePa: Provides a UI panel for editing all personalized text, images, and music, validating files and updating stored personalization data.
Validates image file type/size and converts images to data URLs.
frontend/src/personalization/Personaliza: Manages personalization state, merging overrides with defaults and persisting them via localStorage.
frontend/src/personalization/storage.ts: Handles loading, saving, and clearing personalization overrides in localStorage.
frontend/src/personalization/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for all personalized content structures and override types.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Renders a themed footer using personalized text and links, including animated heart elements.
frontend/src/sections/GallerySection.tsx: Displays a responsive image gallery using personalized items and handles fallback when custom images fail to load.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Shows the personalized hero banner with heading, subheading, and CTA button that scrolls to the story section.
Renders the personalized love letter with decorative background and styled handwritten text.
frontend/src/sections/OurStorySection.ts: Renders the Our Story section using personalized text and a timeline mapped into styled cards.
frontend/src/sections/ReasonsILoveYouSec: Displays a list of love reasons with heart-styled cards and allows adding new reasons via input.
frontend/src/sections/SpecialSurpriseSec: Shows a revealable surprise message and optional music player with play/pause controls using personalization data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend styling.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architecture notes, and existing feature definitions.
